message.content:
I need to calculate the main business revenue from this transactions data. Main business revenue typically comes from the company's primary activities, which in this case appears to be selling products.

Let me identify all the sale transactions and sum up their amounts.

## Step 1: Identify all sale transactions
Looking at the data, I can see that all sale transactions have a "type" field value of "Sale". I need to sum up the "amount" field for all these transactions.
